snippet.title: Pampas & Selene - Demo Release Trailer [Steam]
snippet.description:
From the creator of UnEpic and UnMetal comes a retro classic reborn... Introducing - Pampas & Selene: The Maze of Demons.

Wishlist on Steam now ► s.team/a/1966220
Try it out! Play the demo ► s.team/a/2784820

Connect with us:
Join the community ► discord.gg/jX972F5Wkj
Get updates ► twitter.com/unepic_games

Pampas & Selene is a retro 8-bit metroidvania created for MSX2 computers. This PC version includes some modern improvements as well as support for local and online multiplayer.

The action involves exploring a vast castle, where you can swap between Pampas and Selene alone or explore it cooperatively with a friend. Find items, improve your talents, gain new unique abilities, conquer challenging bosses, and seek help from eight Greek gods by means of their quests.
Action, exploration, battles and loot. The 8-bit legend needs you if the land of Greek is ever to find peace again.

Voice Over: https://twitter.com/TheVocalButcher
Video Production: https://twitter.com/KDraconis
Storyboarding + Scripting + General Production:
https://twitter.com/Jacklifear
https://twitter.com/InVerumGaming
